TRACKS_FORCE: <font color="#FF00FF">OGRE NINJA:</font> to force aiming for Tracks
UI_ACTIVATION_KEYS_tooltip:
Switches the mode during the game
<font color="#FFFF00">-Any weakspot</font>: no priorities
<font color="#FFFF00">-Fueltanks</font> have higher priority
<font color="#FFFF00">-Ammorack and fueltanks</font> have higher priority
Default: <font color="#FFFF00">MOUSE2</font>

Default: <font color="#FFFF00">Enabled</font>

UI_BLOCK_SHOT_tooltip:
Extras: <font color="#80D639">Blocking senseless shooting</font>

<font color="#FFFF00">-Unstoppable obstacles</font>
<font color="#FFFF00">-Penetration chance is too low</font>
<font color="#FFFF00">-great dispersion</font>
Default: <font color="#FFFF00">On</font>
